title: (x) Premier, single storey sans "a" - Albert {Ignacio}
content:
![Premier](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130317im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/47827.jpg)   
   
There seems to me to be something Frutigeresque about this, but the single storey "a" has me confused?
author: swintex
